casebody.data:
Charles E. WILKERSON, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. SPRINGFIELD PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 186, Defendant-Appellee. No. 01-4289. United States Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. July 31, 2002.

Before COFFEY, RIPPLE, and KANNE, Circuit Judges.

ORDER

On consideration of the Plaintiff-Appellant’s petition for rehearing, filed on July 16, 2002, the judges on the panel have voted to deny the petition. Accordingly,

It is ORDERED that the petition for rehearing is DENIED.
